SYSTEM: Re-engineer_NOR-_EVERIS%28v3-boris%29.pdf: Página 5
5
Non-Ontological Resource Re-engineering 
XML, DB, Flat file, 
Spreadsheet
Path Enumeration, 
Adjacency List, …
C. Scheme
Frame based, 
Description Logics, …
RDF(S), OWL
PR-NOR Library at http://ontologydesignpatterns.org
Patterns for re-engineering non-ontological Resources (PR-NOR) define a procedure to transform knowledge-aware resources into ontologies 
taking into account the resource type (thesaurus, classification scheme, etc.) and their underlying resource data model. For every type of resource 
and data model, the NeOn method defines a pattern with a well-defined sequence of activities. Our patterns perform the  following transformations:
• TBox transformation: for transforming the resource content into an ontology schema. 
• ABox transformation: for transforming the resource   schema into an ontology schema, and the resource content, into ontology instances.
speaker: SYSTEM
